Text: Great prog , but last time I upgraded  from the  free version , just    found out the  'paid ' versions was no different.

I do not recommend downloading this torrent for home users.

Ccleaner Professional and Business Edition differ from the free home version in 3 ways:

-Live Support (If you don't know how to use Ccleaner you can't use a computer. Also you need a valid email and password to use live support.)

-Automatic Updates (Disabled in cracked version.)

-Users Option (Used to deploy to multiple computers on a network. It's useless for home/professional setups because you need to update Ccleaner individually on every computer because the cracked version doesn't work with auto update.)
